DOC.brief_summary: A study investigating the analgesic effect of melatonin in a human heat injury model using quantitative sensory testing.
DOC.criteria: Healthy males aged between 20 and 40 years Under aged/minors Does not speak or understand danish Alcohol or abuse of medicines Prior QSTtrial within the last 2 month Prior medical trail within the last month Serious comorbidity (ASAclass 34) Chronic pain (defined by analgesic treatment) Shiftwork or night work within the last 14 days Known sleepdisorder
